name: Mejia Carr
_review: This is my first smartwatch ever, and I really love it! It does everything I need it to and more. The look is really clean for the black aluminum model.Other than that, this is a great product.

name: Fulton Bridges
_review: If you are used to measuring your fitness goals using Fitbit, you may be happier buying another Fitbit. Fitbit's reports are much clearer to read and more easily accessible on their apps.

name: Bridgett Saunders
_review: I have tried watches from Samsung and Fitbit and by far the Apple Watch Series 6 is superior. I did really like the Fitbit Sense but the button on the lower left hand side drove me crazy.

name: Brianna Blanchard
_review: My doctor told me that I was having a fatty liver because my job requires me to seat a lot and I rarely workout. So, I bought this Apple watch 6 series because I thought it do much more job than my old 3 series.

name: Rutledge Bowen
_review: I like it‚Äôs design and ease of use for most of the software but in many ways, it has too many features considering it doesn‚Äôt allow me to remove the ones I don‚Äôt want.

name: Corinne Lara
_review: I also buy a clear cover for the watch face to make it last longer and there are a host of strap options that will allow you to customize the color of your watch to fit your wardrobe.

name: Phillips Cochran
_review: Originally, I thought these watches were dumb and a waste of money. I finally caved and bought one‚Ä¶..and I have to say that I love it. I wear it every day. I can start my truck, monitor my home security cameras, check my messages, track my workouts, and so much more.

name: Barr Blake
_review: The watch sleep tracking is a joke...I get more information from my wife. But to give you a little more information... they want you to give permission to have your iPhone listen (and probably watch) while you sleep. Not kidding.
